item.title: Using Chinese Characters in Matplotlib
item.description: After searching from Google, here is easiest solution. This should also works on other languages: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt %matplotlib inline %config InlineBackend.figure_format = 'retina' import matplotlib.font_manager as fm f = "/System/Library/Fonts/PingFang.ttc" prop = fm.FontProperties(fname=f) plt.title("你好",fontproperties=prop) plt.show() Output:
